articles.author: Lauren Boland
articles.title: 'Sustainable' investment funds in Ireland hold over $3 billion in fossil fuels - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: An investigation across Europe found 388 ‘sustainable’ funds that invest in fossil fuel and aviation companies.
articles.content: INVESTMENT FUNDS IN Ireland that declared themselves to be sustainable collectively hold more than $3 billion worth of investments in the fossil fuel and aviation industries, an investigation has fou… [+3178 chars]

articles.title: Women and men mistakenly given different advice to prevent heart disease - EurekAlert
